document.full_text: general motors co  said on wednesday its chevrolet cruze small car was on track to exceed 50,000 u.s. sales in the first quarter, aided by demand in markets usually dominated by imports.
document.title: gm expects robust cruze sales due to converts
lines_and_colors: general motors co  said on wednesday its chevrolet cruze small car was on track to exceed 50,000 u.s. sales in the first quarter, aided by demand in markets usually dominated by imports.
